name: ngx-mat-third-party-licenses-list-view
description: An Angular Material component library that provides a list view of third-party licenses.

scripts.postbuild: npx copyfiles schematics/*/schema.json schematics/*/files/** schematics/collection.json ./../../LICENSE ../../dist/ngx-mat-third-party-licenses-list-view/ && npx copyfiles -f ../../LICENSE ../../README.md ../../dist/ngx-mat-third-party-licenses-list-view/
